title: The Curse of Laradjongran
creator_credit: Community Aid Abroad, Peter Tammer and Monique Tammer
brief_description: Looks at some aspects of community development programs in Indonesia which are funded and administered by the Australian overseas aid agency Community Aid Abroad.
